|rad1chip2 = Marvell;88W8060; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM Gemtek WRTM-177GN (WRTM-177GN_V01) ==Links of Interest== [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wnr854t On the OpenWrt wiki] [http://img.tomshardware.com/de/2006/07/26/grundlagen_neuen_802.11n_standards/draft_11n_netgear_wnr854t_board_big.jpg Internal shot] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_wnr854t |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wnr854t |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 10.03 |current_supported_version = 12.09 |comment = Unsupported Functions: PCI Wireless not supported as firmware image not available }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===JTAG=== ====JTAG Pinouts==== CON3 is 10-pin JTAG ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== J1 is unpopulated 9 pin serial
